sample.name: Elyra
sample.background: Elyra was once a street urchin, surviving through wit and agility. She discovered a talent for thievery and deception, leading her to become a skilled rogue. Now, she seeks fortune and adventure, always looking for the next big score.
sample.private_notes: the bell sound feels familiar. hate that.

sample.name: Brom Stone
sample.background: Brom hails from a long line of warriors and has trained in the art of combat since childhood. Known for his unwavering loyalty and strong sense of duty, Brom is a stalwart protector of his friends. He wields his battleaxe with precision and strength, ready to face any challenge head-on.

sample.name: Mira
sample.background: Mira grew up in a small village where she was drawn to the teachings of a benevolent deity. Her compassionate nature and desire to help others led her to become a cleric. Mira uses her divine magic to heal and protect her allies, often serving as the moral compass of the group.
sample.private_notes: ashford chapel is involved. i can feel it.

sample.name: K-pop College AU
sample.description: slice-of-life college AU with chaotic group chats, fake dating tension, and too many greenhouse shifts.

sample.name: Modern Royalty AU
sample.description: modern monarchy politics, PR disasters, reform vs. tradition, and one heir who hates ceremonies.

sample.name: Mafia Heist AU
sample.description: rival crews, debt, street racing, dirty jobs, and loyalty that looks a lot like possession.

sample.name: Echoes of the Fallen Realm
sample.description: a text-based fantasy campaign where ancient ruins, broken oaths, and forgotten gods resurface. choices matter, rolls are public, and the realm remembers everything.

sample.name: Ashford Hollow: The Red Ledger
sample.description: a campaign of cursed contracts, missing pilgrims, and a town that keeps rewriting its own history. oaths bind harder than chains, and the ledger always balances.
